#summary Digital Audio Filter Test Program WWAudioFilter
#labels Featured

= WWAudioFilter =

WWAudioFilter is my personal experiment program of several digital audio filtering techniques.

= Functions Available =

  * 16bit/24bit FLAC file read, 24bit FLAC file write
  * 1bit DSF write
  * linear-phase FIR low pass filter
  * Zero-order hold upsampling
  * FFT upsampling
  * Gain adjustment
  * 2nd order Noise shaping

All filters are processed using 64-bit floating point type.

http://bitspersampleconv2.googlecode.com/files/WWAudioFilter102.png
